formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide a unique name for the configuration, keeping in mind that you may need to create additional configurations over time.

formElement.label: Description:
formElement.documentation: Provide a simple description for this configuration.

formElement.label: Identity Service URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name or IP address of the Identity Service for OpenStack

formElement.label: Compute Service URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name or IP address of the Compute Service for OpenStack

formElement.label: Block Storage URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name or IP address of the Block Storage Service for OpenStack

formElement.label: Login as:
formElement.documentation: OpenStack account username/password. This account must have enough privileges to perform API functions.

formElement.label: Resource:
formElement.documentation: The name of the resource (or pool) on which the integration steps can run (default is 'local').

formElement.label: Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The workspace to use for resources dynamically created by this configuration (default is 'default').

formElement.label: Debug Level:
formElement.documentation: Level for output: 0=errors only, 1=normal headers and responses, 2+=debugging information included.
